thread.title: Malaysia's Mahathir won't be sworn in as prime minister on Thursday: palace spokesman

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Malaysia's Mahathir won't be sworn in as prime minister on Thursday: palace spokesman
text:
KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - Mahathir Mohamad will not be sworn in as Malaysia’s next prime minister on Thursday, a palace spokesman told Reuters, without giving a reason.
Mahathir Mohamad, former Malaysian prime minister and opposition candidate for Pakatan Harapan (Alliance of Hope) speaks during a news conference after general election, in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia, May 10, 2018. REUTERS/Lai Seng Sin Mahathir’s opposition alliance won the simple majority it required to form a new government in Wednesday’s polls, a stunning result that will end six decades of rule by a coalition he once led. The 92-year-old had said he would be sworn in on Thursday.
Reporting by Fathin Ungku; Editing by Paul Tait
